row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'AblPolDarl_Bearb' :SET &BEARBEITER# = '1' :SET &TERMINE_IMS# = 'J' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p460_&TS#.out' ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL_VTR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# BEARBEITER = &BEARBEITER# TERMINE = &TERMINE_IMS# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
